title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
con1 like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or con2 like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or con3 like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or con4 like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} and postright = 0 ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
